titles.title: Heritage Homes Tax Incentive Act of 2001
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide for an enhanced deduction for qualified residence interest on acquisition indebtedness for heritage homes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 7/18/2002--Introduced. Heritage Homes Tax Incentive Act of 2001 (sic) - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to grant a deduction of 125% of residence interest paid or accrued on acquisition indebtedness for heritage homes (instead of the present 100%).
